ch0311_00_yone/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re looking
bright-eyed and bushy-tailed today!
ch0311_00_yone/0101_0701_02_10:
Pasio is still full of mystery to me! Could you
show me around?
ch0311_00_yone/7101_0701_01_10:
The wardens in Hisui take care of Pokémon
that have a connection to almighty Sinnoh.
ch0311_00_yone/7101_0701_02_10:
Almighty Sinnoh being, of course, mighty
Dialga and mighty Palkia.
ch0311_00_yone/7101_0701_03_10:
They are to be respected and revered. Most
Hisui people view Pokémon that way.
ch0311_00_yone/7102_0701_01_10:
In Hisui, Wyrdeer is a Pokémon we’re
grateful for, as it lets people ride it as it
runs across the land.
ch0311_00_yone/7102_0701_02_10:
In this era, many Pokémon do the same,
right? Allow people to ride them?
ch0311_00_yone/7102_0701_03_10: Let’s not forget to thank those Pokémon.
ch0311_00_yone/7103_0701_01_10:
That girl Marley... She looks like a
younger me.
ch0311_00_yone/7103_0701_02_10:
Maybe mighty Dialga brought us together
for a reason.
ch0311_00_yone/7104_0701_01_10:
Adaman, the leader of the Diamond Clan,
is like a younger brother to me.
ch0311_00_yone/7104_0701_02_10:
He’s still inexperienced, but he does his best
to be reliable.
ch0311_00_yone/7104_0701_03_10:
If you ever run into trouble, please ask him
for help!
ch0311_00_yone/7105_0701_01_10:
They say time solves even the toughest
problems.
ch0311_00_yone/7105_0701_02_10:
That’s what I believe, as a follower of
mighty Dialga.
ch0311_00_yone/7105_0701_03_10:
When you’ve hit a wall, try not to rush,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0311_00_yone/7105_0701_04_10:
Mighty Dialga will lend its aid to those who
forge their own fate!
ch0311_00_yone/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this on a walk with my partner.
Want it?
ch0311_00_yone/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure you’ll find a fancy way to use it.
ch0311_00_yone/2501_0701_01_10:
For a long time, the Diamond Clan and the
Pearl Clan were unable to get along, due to
their history.
ch0311_00_yone/2501_0701_02_10:
That is, until they had to solve some
problems that affected everyone in Hisui.
ch0311_00_yone/2501_0701_03_10:
Time is all about change...and people’s
feelings can change, too.
ch0311_00_yone/2501_0702_01_10:
You seem to get along with both Adaman
and Irida.
ch0311_00_yone/2501_0702_03_10:
No matter how much time passes, I hope you
can continue to be their friend.
ch0311_00_yone/2511_0701_01_10:
I sometimes wonder what the people and
Pokémon of Hisui are doing in the future.
ch0311_00_yone/2511_0701_02_10: I hear that in this era, Hisui is called Sinnoh.
ch0311_00_yone/2511_0701_03_10:
One day, I’d like to go around and see
the land of Sinnoh with my own eyes.
ch0311_00_yone/2511_0702_01_10:
There are forces that can bring about good
changes to those around them.
ch0311_00_yone/2511_0702_02_10:
Such forces include people, Pokémon,
and time.
ch0311_00_yone/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Time wasted is lost... Spend it
wisely so you have no regrets.
ch0311_00_yone/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s important to set aside time for people
and Pokémon to enjoy each other’s company.
ch0311_00_yone/3005_0701_01_10:
Another day is nearly over... The time we
spend today shapes tomorrow, so make
it count!
